action.action-desc: Mr. Danny K. Davis of Illinois (for himself, Mr. Scott of Virginia, Ms. Lee, Ms. DeLauro, and Mr. Richmond) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Education and the Workforce

form.official-title: To reinstate Federal Pell Grant eligibility for individuals incarcerated in Federal and State penal institutions, and for other purposes.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Restoring Education And Learning Act of 2017 or the REAL Act of 2017.

section.header: Reinstatement of Federal pell grant eligibility
section.text: Section 401(b) of the Higher Education Act of 1965 (20 U.S.C. 1070a(b)) is amended—

paragraph.text: by striking paragraph (6) and redesignating paragraph (7) as paragraph (6); and
in paragraph (2)(A)(ii), by striking (7)(B) and inserting (6)(B).

section.text: The amendments made by section 2 shall be effective for academic year 2017–2018 and succeeding academic years.
